## Project Affiliation

VegVault is part of the [BIODYNAMICS](https://bit.ly/BIODYNAMICS) project, which aims to understand biodiversity dynamics under changing climatic conditions.

## Acknowledgments

We thank the global community of data contributors, including:

- Neotoma Paleoecology Database contributors
- sPlotOpen consortium members
- BIEN database contributors  
- TRY Plant Trait Database contributors
- CHELSA and WoSIS data providers
